item.name: vulnerability 001
item.description: The vulnerability was detected in the remote SSH server
item.recommendation: Apply security update 2021-04-01 to all affected systems.

item.name: vulnerability 002
item.description: Remote code execution vulnerabilities were discovered in software running on the server
item.recommendation: Upgrade the affected applications to their latest version to resolve the issue.

item.name: vulnerability 003
item.description: The system appears to be exposing non-personally identifiable information about its users.
item.recommendation: Configure the system to stop showing the sensitive information, or configure proper authentication and authorization controls are in place for accessing the sensitive information.

item.name: vulnerability 004
item.description: An information exposure vulnerability exists on the remote system, the scanner detected NGINX v2.0.1 running on the host.
item.recommendation: Configure the system to remove the HTTP header: `Server` from all responses.
